summary: Johnny Knoxville and his band of maniacs perform a variety of stunts and gross-out gags on the big screen for the first time.
cast: Johnny Knoxville|Bam Margera|Steve-O|Chris Pontius|Ryan Dunn|Jason 'Wee Man' Acuña|Preston Lacy|Dave England|Ehren McGhehey|Brandon DiCamillo|April Margera|Phil Margera|Jess Margera|Chris Raab|Rakeyohn|Loomis Fall|Rick Kosick|Manny Puig|Stephanie Hodge|Jason 'J2' Rasmus|Dorothy Barnett|Tony Hawk|Mat Hoffman|Eric Butterbean Esch|Henry Rollins|Eric Koston|Clyde Singleton|Rip Taylor|Spike Jonze|Jeff Tremaine|Trip Taylor|Michelle Klepper|Greg Iguchi|Dimitry Elyashkevich|Sean Cliver|Mark Rackley|Mike Kassak|Jack Polick|Jason Fijal|Gene LeBell|Cory Nastazio|Scott Silveira|David A. Kipper|Lance Bangs|Brad Bartlett|Naoko Kumagai
title: Jackass: The Movie
